PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-13412010-10-28,  ,  ,  HERITAGE,  , 
ActPublic Service Employment Act
SubjectStatistics Canada Census and Survey Related Term Employment Exclusion Approval Order
PrecisSTATISTICS CANADA CENSUS AND SURVEY RELATED TERM EMPLOYMENT EXCLUSION APPROVAL ORDER, in order to exclude positions in Statistics Canada whose function is solely to provide administrative or management support or to perform data processing duties for the purpose of conducting the population census and the agriculture census or the National Household Survey (NHS) when it replaces the population census long-form questionnaire and is conducted in conjunction with the population census, and the persons appointed or deployed to those positions on a specified term basis.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2010-0081 Publication Date: 2010-11-10
AttachmentsAttachment
